answers.answer: Hello,Such non healing of anal fissure even after surgery can occur if there is any recurrent fissure or the anal fissure extends into the ring of muscle that holds your anus closed (internal anal sphincter). This makes it more difficult for your anal fissure to heal.For these non healing anal fissures, it is advisable to get these two possibilities evaluated from your operating surgeon.I hope it helps. Take care and regards.
